title: Coming out the Closet
itunes:title: Coming out the Closet
description:
Monday 4/2 - Today on the show we were visited by attorney and TV host Eboni K Williams, where she spoke about police shootings, the backlash Killer Mike received from NRA interview, and more. Also after Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that had his girlfriend rape his child because he suspected his son was gay, we opened up the phone lines to see how our listeners would react if their son was gay ( not like it should be a problem anyway).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Monday 4/2 - Today on the show we were visited by attorney and TV host Eboni K Williams, where she spoke about police shootings, the backlash Killer Mike received from NRA interview, and more. Also after Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that had his girlfriend rape his child because he suspected his son was gay, we opened up the phone lines to see how our listeners would react if their son was gay ( not like it should be a problem anyway).
